DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety & immune response single dose GSK Biologicals ' cell-culture base influenza vaccine 138842A US license , egg-based trivalent influenza vaccine [ Fluarix ] healthy adult .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immune Response Study GSK Biologicals ' Influenza Virus Vaccine 1388442A Compared With Fluarix
